name: 🅱eamwork
description:
🅱eamwork is a puzzle game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

In the game, you must command a bunch of "things" to fire laser beams at a crystal, which will only power up if all lasers are hitting it at the same time.
Watch out, though, for these "things" have a very short attention span and will wander off if left to their own devices.

This is a game about team management and all the headache that comes with it, but with pretty colors.

Credits
Programming - me
3D Modeling - me
Level Design - me
Sound - no one lmao
